detaileddescription.para: ADC Signal sampling frequency in Hz
Current rated transformation ratio for lem sensor
LEM sensor ADC user buffer for CH5

briefdescription.para: ADC Central callback function which calculates the RMS voltage for the Differential signal from the AD5 & AD6 channels.

detaileddescription.para:
adc
handle not used.
SamplingFreq
which tells the adc samples collected frequency.
bufferPtr
which is pointer to the application provided adc buffer which holds adc samples for CH5 & Ch6.
ADC central always provides 256 fixed number of adc samples per channel so the expecting the users to provide the buffer accordingly.

simplesect.para:
Status of the LemSensor Deinitialization
RETCODE_OK if the Deinitialization is successful
Error for failure

briefdescription.para: function to initialize the ADC, DMA , Board detect pin, Timer required for the LEM sensor sampling & Starts the sampling timer.

simplesect.para:
Status of the LemSensor Initialization
RETCODE_OK if the initialization is successful
Error for failure

briefdescription.para: function to get the RMS current.

parameterdescription.para: To get the LEM Sensor RMS current in ampere.

simplesect.para:
Status of the Getting the LemSensor Rms currnt
RETCODE_OK if the RMS current got successfully
Error for failure.

briefdescription.para: function to get the RMS voltage.

parameterdescription.para: To get the LEM Sensor RMS voltage in volts.

simplesect.para:
Status of the Getting the LemSensor Rms Voltage
RETCODE_OK if the RMS voltage got successfully
Error for failure.
On every #SAMPLING_WINDOW_CYCLES the RMS voltage is updated.

briefdescription.para: Initialize the required components and variables of lem sensor module.

parameterdescription.para: Current transformation ratio for the core used in lemsensor

simplesect.para: : example- Rated transformation ratio is 44.44 for 75Ampere split core current transformer
RETCODE_OK upon successful initialization or error code otherwise

detaileddescription.para: This module handles the LEM sensor features.
This module samples the ADC5 & ADC6 channels and calculates the RMS voltage which is updated on the window period configured by the SAMPLING_WINDOW_CYCLES
